message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering the product to you for $1200000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and understand its worth to you. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1100000.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer. I would like to propose a new counteroffer of $1000000.

I'm still not willing to go as low as $1000000, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. I think this is a reasonable price, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1025000.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'm not going any lower. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.
Considering the product's value and our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1037500.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $1050000, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1037500, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1040000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1035000.
